summary: AN ORDINANCE approving a Development Agreement for property located near the Belltown pea-patch, specifically described as Lots 1 and 2, Block 5, Portion of the Town of Seattle as laid out on the Land Claim of William H. Bell and the northwestern extremity of the Claim of A.A. Denny, commonly known as Bell and Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 1 of Plats, page 29, in King County, Washington.
